mapper.select: select la.id, la.lease_start_date, la.lease_end_date, la.rent, la.status, la.source_type, ai.name apartmentName, ri.room_number, gi.name, gi.url from lease_agreement la left join apartment_info ai on ai.is_deleted = 0 and ai.id = la.apartment_id left join room_info ri on ri.is_deleted = 0 and ri.id = la.room_id left join graph_info gi on gi.is_deleted = 0 and gi.item_type = 2 and gi.item_id = ri.id where la.is_deleted = 0 and la.phone = #{phone}
